document_data.name: Maldraedior
document_data.mainbody: '''Maldraedior''' was a [[blue dragon]]{{cite book/Dragons of Faerûn|152}} more than 3000 years old, who lived in a temple complex near the mining town of [[Dalath]] in [[Unther]]. This was the well-kept secret of a cult that worshiped Maldraedior as a [[deity]].
